message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with video-based person re-identification, which is a problem in computer vision and falls under the category of computer vision (cs.CV). The paper proposes a novel approach that involves the use of GAN-generated images and pose-based alignment, which are techniques commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM) research. The approach also involves the use of a weighted fusion technique to create a more discriminative embedding, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research. Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on two large benchmark datasets, which falls under the category of information retrieval (cs.IR).
